name: Dimension Break 2D MMORPG
description:
Dimension Break is a 2D Top-Down MMORPG in a Sci-Fi/ Fantasy setting

 A big event called the first Dimension Break connected many dimensions across the mulitverse and came with the possibility for new technology and introduced the main universe,  our universe to ether or as the elfs of dimension e-23-1 called it, magic.  Many universes were wiped from existence and inhabitants migrated to new universes. After many years races and humanoid creatures came together to form the federation of dimensions. That is now almost 200 years ago... Now new dangers await, the federation fears a second Dimension Break and everlasting darkness spreads from the depths of the ether. 

Prototype Feature List:

  • Login
  • Signup
  • Client/Server setup
  • 2D sprites for GUIs with animations

Features im currently working on that will be implemented soon:

  • Chat system
  • Player interacation (Serverside code is done)
  • Character creation (2D sprites and other assets are already made)

You want access to the Alpha later this year? Singup on my prototype build and recive a key. 

NOTE! I will keep you on track with updates. This prototype will recieve more features and if the game is ready for Alpha testing I reset and delete all accounts except for players that received an Alpha key.
